languages.text: "Предлагаю переместиться в более уединенное место, где мы сможем предоставить вам материалы дела".
"I suggest we move to a more private location where we can provide you with the case files."
languages.original_text: "Предлагаю переместиться в более уединенное место, где мы сможем предоставить вам материалы дела".

traits.locale_text: "I suggest we move to a more private location where we can provide you with the case files."
"I suggest we move to a more private location where we can provide you with the case files."
"I suggest we move to a more private location where we can provide you with the case files."
"I suggest we move to a more private location where we can provide you with the case files."
"I suggest we move to a more private location where we can provide you with the case files."

languages.text: «Sugiero que vayamos a una ubicación más privada para que pueda entregarle los archivos del caso».
languages.original_text: "I suggest we move to a more private location where we can provide you with the case files."

traits.locale_text: «Sugiero que vayamos a una ubicación más privada para que pueda entregarle los archivos del caso».

languages.text: “我建议我们去个更加隐秘的地方。届时，我会提供案情的相关档案。”
languages.original_text: "I suggest we move to a more private location where we can provide you with the case files."

traits.locale_text: “我建议我们去个更加隐秘的地方。届时，我会提供案情的相关档案。”

languages.text: « Je propose que nous nous retirions dans un endroit plus discret où nous pourrons vous divulguer les détails de l'affaire. »
languages.original_text: "I suggest we move to a more private location where we can provide you with the case files."

traits.locale_text: « Je propose que nous nous retirions dans un endroit plus discret où nous pourrons vous divulguer les détails de l'affaire. »

languages.text: 「よりプライベートな場所に移動し、あなたにケースファイルを提供することを提案します」
languages.original_text: "I suggest we move to a more private location where we can provide you with the case files."

traits.locale_text: 「よりプライベートな場所に移動し、あなたにケースファイルを提供することを提案します」

languages.text: "Size olay dosyalarını verebileceğimiz, daha özel bir yere geçmemizi öneriyorum."
languages.original_text: "I suggest we move to a more private location where we can provide you with the case files."

traits.locale_text: "Size olay dosyalarını verebileceğimiz, daha özel bir yere geçmemizi öneriyorum."

languages.text: "Ich schlage vor, wir ziehen uns an einen etwas privateren Ort zurück, um die Details zu besprechen."
languages.original_text: "I suggest we move to a more private location where we can provide you with the case files."

traits.locale_text: "Ich schlage vor, wir ziehen uns an einen etwas privateren Ort zurück, um die Details zu besprechen."

languages.original_text: "I suggest we move to a more private location where we can provide you with the case files."
